author: marvin
msg: Separate base makefiles into distinct variable assignment and target

author: reto
msg: CLEREZZA-510: re-enabled usingAsciiArrows test using RichGraphNodes and simplified EzGraph

author: rwesten
msg: * updated version of the defaultdata bundle to 0.0.3
* The configuration and the default data for dbpedia is now loaded form the defaultdata bundle. Therefore the according configurations where removed from the stable and the full launcher.
* The dbpedia referenced site (entityhub) and the Entity Linking Engine (Enhancer) now fully operates in offline mode (on a 43k Entity big local index)
* added metatype.properties file for this engine
* The TaxonomylinkingEngine is now part of the full launcher

Resolved a cyclic build dependency maven was not aware of because internal dependencies of the maven-launchpad-plugin (defined in the bundles/list.xml file) are not exposed to maven. Previously the reasoners/web bundle included integration tests that needed the full launcher. In the meantime those test where moved to stanbol/integration-tests  however the dependency was never removed. When recently the reasoners/web bundle was also added to the full launcher maven started to build the full launcher before the reasonsers/web bundle what caused the build to fail.
This removes the unused dependency to the full launcher and therefore should resolve this problem.
